graph.original_query: Make an amazing LLM Chat UI Interface, add some simuilated chats between LLM and human as well, including image or chart example in the chat. Show header, siderbar and make it in dark theme. (HTML/JS/CSS). This is an expensive project, so need as many design elements as possible. Can CoderAgent atleast 10 times, everytime adding one interesting feature. In the demo chat, show atleast 10-15 interactions. Show chart in the chatwindow. Chat window should be scrollable. There should be a chat history shown on the left sidebar (which should be collapsable). Show dropdown to change the LLM Model as well. Also don't use random names for things, use realisting examples for chat names, etc.. Make it look as if designed professionally for a VC pitch.. show off!! use amazing fonts, and colorful shadows!

globals_schema.execution_result_T001: Created basic HTML structure for LLM chat UI interface with header, collapsable left sidebar, and main chat window using a dark theme.
globals_schema.execution_result_T002: Created CSS styling for the LLM chat UI interface with a dark theme, modern fonts, colorful shadows, and responsiveness.
globals_schema.execution_result_T003: Created Javascript code that implements functionality for the collapsable left sidebar and a scrollable chat window.
globals_schema.execution_result_T004: Created JavaScript code for LLM model dropdown menu.
globals_schema.execution_result_T005: Generated Python script to create simulated chat history data as a JavaScript object.
globals_schema.execution_result_T006: Generated JavaScript to populate the chat history sidebar with data from previous steps.
globals_schema.execution_result_T007: Generated simulated chat interactions as a JavaScript object, including text messages and an inline SVG chart example.
globals_schema.execution_result_T008: Added JavaScript to display simulated chat interactions, distinguishing between LLM and human messages, and rendering the chart.
globals_schema.execution_result_T009: Created CSS styling for chat messages, differentiating between user and LLM messages, and styled the chart.
globals_schema.execution_result_T010: Created Javascript code to simulate sending and receiving new messages in the chat window.
globals_schema.execution_result_T011: Consolidated all code from previous steps into a single, final HTML file, ensuring it runs without errors.

nodes.description: Generate basic HTML structure with header, sidebar, chat window
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for an LLM chat UI interface. Include a header, a collapsable left sidebar, and a main chat window. The chat window should be scrollable.  Use a dark theme.  Do not include any chat content yet. Ensure the basic layout is functional and responsive. Write the full HTML code. No need to save or execute. Add IDs and Classes for the elements.

output.execution_result_T001: Created basic HTML structure for LLM chat UI interface with header, collapsable left sidebar, and main chat window using a dark theme.

execution_result.execution_result_T001: Created basic HTML structure for LLM chat UI interface with header, collapsable left sidebar, and main chat window using a dark theme.

nodes.description: Add CSS styling for dark theme, fonts, shadows
nodes.agent_prompt: Create CSS styling for the LLM chat UI interface from `code_step_T001`. Use a dark theme with visually appealing fonts and colorful shadows to make it look professional and modern. The header and sidebar should have distinct styles. Style the chat window for easy readability and visual appeal. Ensure responsiveness for different screen sizes. Write the full CSS code. No need to save or execute.

output.execution_result_T002: Created CSS styling for the LLM chat UI interface with a dark theme, modern fonts, colorful shadows, and responsiveness.

execution_result.execution_result_T002: Created CSS styling for the LLM chat UI interface with a dark theme, modern fonts, colorful shadows, and responsiveness.

nodes.description: Implement JavaScript for sidebar collapse/expand, scrollable chat
nodes.agent_prompt: Write Javascript code that implements functionality for the collapsable left sidebar and a scrollable chat window. This code will be implemented with `code_step_T001` and `code_step_T002` from prior steps. Sidebar should collapse/expand smoothly. Chat window should automatically scroll to the bottom when new messages are added. No need to save or execute.

output.execution_result_T003: Created Javascript code that implements functionality for the collapsable left sidebar and a scrollable chat window.

execution_result.execution_result_T003: Created Javascript code that implements functionality for the collapsable left sidebar and a scrollable chat window.

nodes.description: Add JavaScript for LLM model dropdown functionality
nodes.agent_prompt: Create JavaScript code to implement a dropdown menu for selecting different LLM models. The dropdown should be populated with realistic LLM model names. When a model is selected, an event should be triggered (no actual LLM interaction needed, just simulate the selection). This code will be implemented with `code_step_T001`, `code_step_T002` and `code_step_T003` from prior steps. No need to save or execute.

output.execution_result_T004: Created JavaScript code for LLM model dropdown menu.

execution_result.execution_result_T004: Created JavaScript code for LLM model dropdown menu.

nodes.agent_prompt: Generate simulated chat history data with realistic names and timestamps. Include 10-15 chat sessions each. Chat history should be suitable for display in the left sidebar, showing name and last message time. Return the data as a javascript object. No need to save or execute.
